TopicTitle: To get to the mun with Demo?

Articles.Content: I only have the demo, but I need to get to the mun. Any tips?

Hello WhenYourFuelTanksDon'tWork, and welcome to the forum!

I'm afraid I haven't played the demo.  You will find lots of good info in the Gameplay Questions section of the forum, though.  Good to have you aboard.

Happy landings!

Hi @WhenYourFuelTanksDon'tWork!

It's been a while since I last played the demo, but let's see...

Few things-

Do not put anything on the bottom of SRBs. They do not need a nozzle, they already have one.

Put a chute on the top of your rocket.

When you're in orbit, point your ship at the prograde (towards the       I      ) marker.
                                                                                                            - O -

When you want to go to the Mun, wait until the moon rises above the horizon + two more seconds for every 100 Km you are above Kerbin and then start your burn.
Go to map view, and wait until you have an encounter with the moon. When you reach the moon, turn around till you face away from the Prograde marker. When you are at periapsis, burn until you have an orbit.
 

 

Edited December 19, 2015 by Dman979
